text: ara yara anusarana karechila tara balabe, ‘haya! Yadi ekabara amadera phire ya'oyara suyoga hato tabe amara'o tadera theke samparka chinna karatama yemana tara amadera theke samparka chinna kareche’ [1]. Ebhabe allah‌ tadera karyabali taderake dekhabena, tadera jan'ya aksepasbarupa [2]. Ara tara kakhano aguna theke bahirgamanakari naya
